detaileddescription.para:
Signal function of the switch
sw
pointer to a switch object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Create a switch objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new switch
copy
pointer to a switch object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created switch

Turn ON the switch
sw
pointer to a switch objec
anim
LV_ANOM_ON: set the value with an animation; LV_ANIM_OFF: change the value immediately

Turn OFF the switch
sw
pointer to a switch object
anim
LV_ANIM_ON: set the value with an animation; LV_ANIM_OFF: change the value immediately

Toggle the position of the switch
sw
pointer to a switch object
anim
LV_ANIM_ON: set the value with an animation; LV_ANIM_OFF: change the value immediately
resulting state of the switch.

Set a style of a switch
sw
pointer to a switch object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Set the animation time of the switch
sw
pointer to a switch object
anim_time
animation time
style pointer to a style

Get a style of a switch
sw
pointer to a switch object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to a style

Get the animation time of the switch
sw
pointer to a switch object
style pointer to a style
